indicator_name: Progress towards national targets established in accordance with Aichi Biodiversity Target 2 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity 2011–2020
target_name: By 2020, integrate ecosystem and biodiversity values into national and local planning, development processes, poverty reduction strategies and accounts
un_custodian_agency: United Nations Environment Programme (UN Environment), Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD), United Nations Statistics Division (UNSD) and UNEP-WCMC
